caption.p: UPLC-MS chromatograms of compounds in the negative ion mode: Gallic acid ( 1) (1.14 min), mangiferin ( 2) (4.21 min), caffeic acid ( 3) (3.92 min), tectoridin ( 4) (5.47 min), irisolidone d-glucoside ( 6) (6.95 min), iristectorigenin B ( 7) (7.53 min), irigenin ( 9) (7.62 min), 5,6-dihydroxy-7,8,3′,5′-tetramethoxyisoflavone ( 10) (8.19 min), and irisolidone ( 11) (8.47 min).
